description:
Rookie policewoman Mai Kawai is ready to quit the force when the job turns out to not be what she expected, until the arrival of her new instructor Sergeant Fuji causes her to consider sticking around after all.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Déballage & sac de frappe (Partie 1) / Déballage & sac de frappe (Partie 2)
Unbox & Punching Bag: Part 1 / Unbox & Punching Bag: Part 2
Unbox & Sandbag: Sono 1 / Unbox & Sandbag: Sono 2
アンボックス&サンドバック~その1~ / アンボックス&サンドバック~その2~
